channel.title: Objects to blank source

item.title: Objects to blank source
item.dc:creator: @14harry14 14harry14
item.description:
@14harry14 wrote:

Hi! I was wondering how i could add objects into blank sources… I know how to add to the regular sources, but the blank source is missing some codes, and i dont know if i need to put them in or not…

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);

I dont know if im doing it right, but ive added

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() {
Should i put makeGlobalObje…and the cords and such now? And how should it end? (with another code?)

Read full topic
